name: Adams Pecan Custard Perfection
description: this simple dessert is sweet, moist, creamy and sprinkled with the roasted candied pecans. If you're looking for a perfect desert vape look no further. Wonder Flavours is a Canadian flavor company that is currently killing the game. If you haven't yet ordered some I recommend you do
author: KAUZ514

reviews.text: I just mixed this up 2 weeks ago and man this is so freaking good! Well done. Very buttery and rich, right up my alley. The roasted pecans and cream at 1% is just enough to add a nice roasty note without the sort of coffee note I can get from that flavor.

Delicious. I love the custard base. Vienna Cream adds some depth and an ice cream twist while Butter Cream gives it a waxiness that I find appealing. The triple threat of FW Butter Pecan, WF Pecan Pie, and WF Roasted Pecan create a robust nutty note that stands up to the hefty custard base. It’s roasted, buttery, and crunchy. Very authentic butter pecan in a thick, rich custard.. Perfect time of year for this kind of recipe.

I was new to DIY and was looking for a pecan pie mix to make for my husbands replacement ADV, and this was it. Thank you. It's delicious. Perfect blend of sweet, creamy custard and buttery, nutty goodness.
